hub.title: Reports
hub.description: Your financial reports help you understand your business performance, track profitability, and make informed decisions. Monitor your financial health, income, and cash flow in one place.
hub.safe_to_draw_subtitle: The amount you can safely take out

cards.business_health_desc: Shows what your business owns, owes, and is worth. Your financial position at a glance.
cards.profit_loss_desc: Shows how much you earned, what it cost, and your final profit. Your income statement.
cards.cash_movement_desc: Shows where your cash came from and where it went. Track your cash flow over time.

health.title: Business Health
health.subtitle: A snapshot of what your business owns and is worth
health.liabilities_note: Kyora doesn't track loans or credit yet. This will be available in a future update.
health.equity_explanation: These represent your equity movements. Your total business value (shown above) equals all assets owned by the business.
health.note_negative_cash: Cash is estimated from transactions. A negative value means asset purchases and expenses exceeded revenue and investments.
health.cash_approximation_note: Note: Cash is estimated from your transactions. A negative value means expenses and asset purchases exceed recorded revenue and investments.

profit.title: Profit & Loss
profit.subtitle: Your income statement for the period
profit.net_profit_subtitle: Bottom line: what you earned after all costs
profit.gross_profit_subtitle: Revenue minus cost of goods sold
profit.gross_margin_help: Shows how much profit you make on each sale after covering product costs. Formula: (Gross Profit ÷ Revenue) × 100
profit.profit_margin_help: Shows how much of each sale becomes actual profit. Formula: (Net Profit ÷ Revenue) × 100. Higher is better!
profit.margin_example: Example: {{percent}}% means for every {{currency}} 100 in sales, you keep {{currency}} {{amount}}

cashflow.title: Cash Movement
cashflow.subtitle: How cash flows through your business
cashflow.net_change_help: Total money in minus total money out for the period

insights.title: Business Advisor
insights.healthy: Your business is in a healthy position. You own more than you owe.
insights.negative_equity: Your business value is negative. This means expenses and withdrawals exceed profits.
insights.negative_cash: Your cash position is estimated as negative. Review recent expenses or add capital.
insights.profitable: You're profitable! For every {{currency}} of sales, you keep {{margin}}%.
insights.losing: You're currently losing money. Your expenses exceed your gross profit by {{amount}}.
insights.cash_healthy: Cash Healthy: More cash came in than went out.
insights.cash_alert: Cash Alert: You spent more than you received. Monitor your cash carefully.
insights.withdrawal_tip: Tip: You withdrew more than your sales revenue. Consider aligning withdrawals with income.

empty.title: Your financial picture starts here
empty.body: Once you start recording orders and expenses, you'll see a complete view of your business finances.

error.title: Couldn't load your reports
error.body: We're having trouble connecting. Please check your internet and try again.
